original_title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
overview: Michael returns to Haddonfield for Jamie Lloyd -- the orphaned daughter of Laurie Strode -- and her babysitter Rachel. Can Dr. Sam Loomis stop him before the unholy slaughter reaches his innocent young niece?
tagline: Ten years ago he changed the face of Halloween. Tonight, HE'S BACK.
title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
